events.title: Iftar Mahfil 2026
events.description:
Assalamu Alaikum,

Warm greetings to everyone on the holy month of Ramadan.

To share the significance and spirit of this blessed month, Mymensingh Students' Association, SUST is going to organize an Iftar Mahfil.
All members of Mymensingh Students' Association — seniors and juniors — are cordially invited to attend the Iftar Mahfil and make the event meaningful and beautiful with your presence.

Thank you.
